title: Did a Parkland Shooting Survivor Say ‘Generations Before Us Don’t Know What It’s Like to Be Shot at by AR-15s?’
subtitle: A number of outlets used a hoax quote to paint David Hogg as hopelessly ignorant of history.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: David Hogg said that generations that came before his don't know what it's like to get shot at by AR-15s.
